revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Meteor Falls |image = [[File:Meteor Falls.png]] |caption = A map of Meteor Falls. |tokens = 18,000 |location = North of Route 115. }} '''Meteor Falls''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 243,000 |- | Solrock (Boss) || 740,000 |- | Lunatone (Boss) || 740,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Golbat * Goldeen * Magikarp * Barboach * Solrock (boss) * Lunatone (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
